SELECT
INNER JOIN movie_box_office mbo ON mbo.movie_id = movie.movie_id WHERE mbo.start_date >= #{startDate} AND mbo.start_date < ADDDATE(#{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 WEEK) AND mbo.country = #{country} AND mbo.gross > 0 GROUP BY movie.movie_id
ORDER BY box_office DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT movie.movie_id) AS totalCount FROM movie INNER JOIN movie_box_office mbo ON mbo.movie_id = movie.movie_id WHERE mbo.start_date >= #{startDate} AND mbo.start_date < ADDDATE(#{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 WEEK) AND mbo.country = #{country} AND mbo.gross > 0

SELECT
INNER JOIN rating_summary mbo ON mbo.movie_id = movie.movie_id WHERE movie.theater_release_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND #{startDate} GROUP BY movie.movie_id ORDER BY mbo.num_wts DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM movie INNER JOIN rating_summary mbo ON mbo.movie_id = movie.movie_id WHERE movie.theater_release_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND #{startDate}

SELECT
INNER JOIN movie_source ms ON ms.movie_id = movie.movie_id INNER JOIN showtimes sh ON sh.source_id = ms.id INNER JOIN theater t ON t.id = sh.theater_id WHERE sh.deleted_ind=0 AND sh.show_date=#{startDate} AND t.country= #{country} GROUP BY ms.movie_id ORDER BY SUM(LENGTH(sh.times)) DESC

SELECT COUNT(distinct movie.movie_id) AS totalCount FROM movie INNER JOIN movie_source ms ON ms.movie_id = movie.movie_id INNER JOIN showtimes sh ON sh.source_id = ms.id INNER JOIN theater t ON t.id = sh.theater_id WHERE sh.deleted_ind=0 AND sh.show_date=#{startDate} AND t.country= #{country}

SELECT
INNER JOIN rating_summary s ON s.movie_id = movie.movie_id WHERE movie.theater_release_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY movie.movie_id ORDER BY s.num_wts DESC

SELECT
INNER JOIN rating_summary s ON s.movie_id = movie.movie_id WHERE movie.status = 1 AND movie.dvd_release_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY movie.dvd_release_date DESC, s.num_wts DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM movie WHERE movie.status = 1 AND movie.dvd_release_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT
